API_Description: Determines whether a click advances the presentation or not.
API_Description_Reason: The name 'clickAdvances' suggests it controls whether clicking advances something, likely a presentation or slide, which is common in full-screen or presentation modes.
Returns: A boolean value indicating if a click advances the presentation.
Returns_Reason: Since the parameter type is boolean, it is logical that the property returns a boolean value indicating the current state of whether a click advances the presentation.

type.description: A boolean value to set whether a click advances the presentation.
type.description_reason: The parameter 'type' being a boolean suggests it is used to enable or disable the click advance feature.
type.type_reason: The parameter is explicitly stated to be of type boolean, indicating it is used to toggle a feature on or off.
